title: BRIEF-African Media Entertainment Says Board Of Classic Approves Voluntary Commencement Of Business Rescue Proceedings
text:
BRIEF-African Media Entertainment Says Board Of Classic Approves Voluntary Commencement Of Business Rescue Proceedings

Stock Markets 10 minutes ago (Oct 01, 2019 11:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-African Media Entertainment Says Board Of Classic Approves Voluntary Commencement Of Business Rescue Proceedings Oct 1 (Reuters) - African Media Entertainment Ltd : * ANNOUNCEMENT TO SHAREHOLDERS REGARDING ITS INVESTMENT IN CLASSIC FM SOUTH AFRICA PROPRIETARY LIMITED (“CLASSIC”) * INFORMED BY BOARD OF CLASSIC THAT RESOLUTION WAS ADOPTED APPROVING VOLUNTARY COMMENCEMENT OF BUSINESS RESCUE PROCEEDINGS * BOARD OF CLASSIC FM SOUTH AFRICA PROPRIETARY LIMITED BELIEVES THAT CLASSIC WILL REMAIN ON AIR * IN INTERIM RESULTS, ADDITIONAL WRITE-OFFS WILL BE IMPLEMENTED TO REDUCE COMPANY'S EXPOSURE TO CLASSIC TO NIL

BRIEF-African Media Entertainment Says Board Of Classic Approves Voluntary Commencement Of Business Rescue Proceedings
description: BRIEF-African Media Entertainment Says Board Of Classic Approves Voluntary Commencement Of Business Rescue Proceedings
